New Records: Tyrese Maxey became the first 76er since Allen Iverson to average 25 points, 7 assists, and 3 steals over a six-game span.
Pre-Game Insights: The 76ers have the fewest home games in the NBA (14), while the Nets have 15 home games this season.
Paul George mentioned the loss to the Warriors as a learning experience regarding pace and player movement.
The 76ers lead the all-time series against the Nets 126-90.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nets are starting a three-game homestand after four consecutive home losses.
The 76ers and Nets will meet twice more in February.
Others: This is the 15th home game of the season for the Nets.
The game will be played in Brooklyn, with the Nets wearing their black Icon Edition uniforms.
